--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:
> bjhong02 wrote:
> 
> > --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:
> > > bjhong02 wrote:
> > >
> > > > I use 1.3.0 on Windows XP to do a broadscape crawl, and use
> > > > MirrorWriter to store the downloaded resource. after a 
period of
> > time,
> > > > some errors appear, java.io.Exception: Can not mkdir ...
> > > >
> > > > I found there're already 23985 subdirectories in the "mirror"
> > > > directory, and there's still 1.5G free disk space. I guess it
> > reaches
> > > > some limitation.
> > >
> > > Can you manually make the directory?
> > > St.Ack
> > >
> >
> > can not make manually.
> 
> Why not?  Whats the complaint from the operating system?
> St.Ack
> 


my windows xp is Chinese version, I translate the message of the os 
as following.

can not create folder 'newfolder'
can not create directory or file.
